history.content:
Happy April! As midterm season comes to a close (or is still going), a group of student organizations have come together to help create a community during the virtual semester. So without further ado, welcome to EE/CS Community Week!

Raffle!

To encourage participation throughout this week, we will be having raffles equalling up to $200 worth of gift cards, tshirts, stickers, and we will be raffling off a pair of Airpods! Each Facebook RSVP will count as (1) ticket. Each event attendance counts as (2) tickets. Liking the EECS Community Facebook page will count as (1) ticket.

*RSVPs will be taken off the FB/form lists. Attendance will be taken automatically by zoom (full duration attendance).

 

Facebook Page

Come like our Facebook page! We’ll be posting tips and tricks, resources, and other event details there :) Special raffles will be held for those who like/follow the page!

 

Events

Course Scheduling Workshop

Date: Monday, April 26th

Time: 6-8pm PST

Links: Facebook | Book it on BCal

Description: Need help deciding what courses to take next semester? CSM and HKN are holding a course planning workshop with experienced students in all different areas of EECS to give advice on signing up for classes. This will be held on Monday, April 26th from 6PM - 8PM at the meeting found at: hkn.mu/event-zoom Everyone is welcome! 

Speed Friending

Date: Tuesday, April 27th

Time: 5-6pm PST

Links: https://csua.org/zoom

Description: Are you watching grass grow at home with no one to talk to? Zoom is a hard place to make new friends and we know it. That's why we're inviting y'all to come to the EECS Community Week’s SPEED FRIENDING event, on Tuesday 04/27 from 5-6 PM PST at https://csua.org/zoom! Come meet some CS enthusiasts and speed friend some of the coolest people ever! 

 

Last Minute Summer Plans

Date: Wednesday, April 28th

Time: 5-6pm PST

Links: https://berkeley.zoom.us/j/98835668562 

Description: Unsure of what to do this upcoming summer? Don’t worry! Come through for an info session about making last minute summer plans. Whether you’re interested in summer classes, teaching, research, internships, personal projects, or something else, we are here to offer you some resources and advice for achieving what you want!

 

Social Game Night

Date: Wednesday, April 28th

Time: 8-9pm PST

Links: Zoom

Description: Come hang out with old and new friends, and play games you like such as Codenames, DrawPhone, Secret Hitler, and Among Us!

 

Advising Session

Date: Thursday, April 29th

Time: 7-9pm PST

Links: Zoom  

Description: Hosted by CSUA, UPE, CSM, HKN, AWE, IEEE, come ask about anything Cal related. Questions about courses, internships, organizations, and more! Come ask whatever you want. 

 

Paint a Pet Rock!

Date: Friday, April 30th

Time: 5-6pm PST

Links: RSVP by April 26th | Book it on BCal | Facebook

Description: Stressed about finals, classes, or life? Need a fun way to decompress? Join us on Friday, April 30th to paint a pet rock and hangout with friends! Now this event needs just a little bit of preparation, but it’s easy :). 1) Sign up on the form. 2) Take a walk, and pick up your next best friend (aka an awesome rock).  

EECS Game Night

Date: Saturday, May 1st

Time: 7-9pm PST

Links: Zoom | Facebook

Description: Join IEEE for a fun EECS Game night! Play party games and make some new friends as a way to relax before finals! We’ll be playing games including Skribbl.io, Codenames, and more!
